description: TEHRAN-The cinematheque of the Tehran Museum of Contemporary Art (TMoCA) will screen the 1964 political satire black comedy film “Dr. Strangelove” directed by Stanley Kubrick on Sunday.
title: TMoCA cinematheque to screen Kubrick’s “Dr. Strangelove”

description: The extrajudicial killing of Palestinian children in Gaza by Israeli soldiers is “systematic and widespread”, and intended to “destroy” the Palestinian people, a UN expert said.
title: UN expert: Israeli drone killing of Palestinian child part of ‘widespread’ executions

description: Gaza’s Civil Defense agency said more than 400 Palestinians have been killed in the north of the territory over the past two weeks during the ongoing military assault by Israeli forces.
title: More than 400 Palestinians killed in two weeks of Israeli attacks on northern Gaza

description: Three partially functioning hospitals treating severely wounded patients and sheltering thousands of displaced Palestinian civilians in northern Gaza are now out of service after coming under intense Israeli fire, a Gaza health official told Al Jazeera.
title: Israeli attacks render all major northern Gaza hospitals out of service

description: BEIRUT- The Israeli enemy forces continue to bulldoze and blow up many homes and civilian facilities in the Lebanese territories especially those bordering occupied Palestine.
title: Hezbollah continues to target air defence bases in Haifa and beyond

description: MADRID- As explained by Portuguese international relations expert Bruno Maçaes, Israel, alongside the United States, believes that the situation in the region is ripe for a political reconfiguration that eliminates all obstacles to its hegemony. Maçaes describes this moment as "liquid," suggesting that Israel sees parallels with 1967, when it successfully defeated Arab forces and annexed parts of Palestine, such as East Jerusalem (al-Quds).
title: Colonial dreams: The unattainable vision of a reconfigured Middle East

description: TEHRAN- A drone launched from Lebanon struck one of Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s residences on Saturday in a direct hit. This is what Netanyahu’s office confirmed.
title: Drone from Lebanon hits Netanyahu’s residence

description: TEHRAN- Israel and its main supporter, the United States, have displayed a lot of hubris since the Tel Aviv regime assassinated Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar in the Gaza Strip.
title: Legacy of fire: Al-Aqsa Storm rages on after Sinwar's killing

description: TEHRAN – In a statement published on Saturday, the family of Lieutenant General Qassem Soleimani, Iran’s late anti-terror icon assassinated by Washington in 2020, expressed deep sorrow over the martyrdom of Palestinian leader Yahya Sinwar.
title: Gen. Soleimani’s family mourns martyrdom of Yahya Sinwar

description: TEHRAN – Mohammad Javad Zarif, Iran's vice president for strategic affairs and former foreign minister, delivered a fiery speech in Esfahan on Saturday, calling for unity in the face of the Israeli regime’s unchecked crimes in the region.
title: Zarif says unity necessary in face of horrifying Israeli crimes

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi delivered a full-throated message to U.S. President Joe Biden on Saturday that pulled no punches: The U.S. will face direct consequences if it helps Israel respond to Iran’s October 1 retaliatory attack.
title: Potential U.S. involvement in Israeli response will not go unnoticed, Iran’s Araqchi warns Biden

description: TEHRAN – The European Union and the Persian Gulf Cooperation Council issued a joint statement at their summit on October 16, 2024, with two notable articles focused on Iran. This note delves into the motivations behind their inclusion in the statement.
title: Iran’s trio islands and claims of the old colonist

description: TEHRAN- In a letter to the Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court (ICC), Hadi Farajvand, the Ambassador of Iran to the Netherlands, has called for urgent action by the legal body to address the crimes of the Zionist regime in Gaza and Lebanon.
title: ICC must hold Israel accountable for crimes in Gaza, Lebanon: Iran envoy

description: TEHRAN – In a message following the martyrdom of Yahya Sinwar, the political leader of Hamas, Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyyed Ali Khamenei praised the Palestinian fighter as a symbol of resistance and struggle, vowing that the Resistance Front would remain strong, despite the loss of prominent figures like Sinwar.
title: Hamas is alive and will stay alive: Leader

description: TEHRAN – Iran is hosting the IONS Combined Naval Exercise in the Pacific Ocean, with participation from several nations.
title: Iran's role in regional cooperation

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araqchi says while Iran does not seek further escalation in the region, it is fully prepared to respond to any Israeli actions in accordance with international law.
title: ‘Iran to respond in line with international law:’ FM pledges retaliation if Israel escalates

description: TEHRAN- In a commentary, Kayhan dealt with the silence and even support by some regional countries for Israel's crimes.
title: Iran’s patience may be running thin

description: TEHRAN-The play “Act Without Words II” by Samuel Beckett is currently on stage at Molavi Theater Hall in Tehran.
title: Beckett “Act Without Words II” on stage at Molavi Theater

description: TEHRAN-The 41st Tehran International Short Film Festival (TISFF) was inaugurated on Friday at Mellat Cineplex in Tehran with a tribute to the martyrs of Gaza.
title: 41st Tehran International Short Film Festival opens at Mellat Cineplex

description: TEHRAN – Mir Saeid Marouf Lakerani, is a name that volleyball fans in Iran and in the world will never forget.
title: Iran volleyball legend Marouf turns 39

description: TEHRAN – A prehistorical cave has recently been discovered in the Siahkalrud rural district of Rudsar county, which is situated in Gilan province, northern Iran.
title: Prehistorical cave discovered in northern Iran

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s southwestern province of Khuzestan is preparing to host a war tourism festival focusing on artistic narratives of the country’s 1980-88 Sacred Defense.
title: War Tourism: Khuzestan to hold festival on artistic narratives of Sacred Defense
Exclusive: Israel hits International road connecting Lebanon to Syria

description: TEHRAN - Chinese ambassador to Iran Cong Peiwu has turned the spotlight on the role of centuries-old caravanserais in linking cultures across the ancient Silk Road.
title: Chinese ambassador highlights Silk Road caravanserais’ role in fostering cross-cultural exchange

description: TEHRAN - Isfahan is set to host the inaugural conference of Iran’s historical cities on Oct. 31, aiming to connect cities with rich cultural heritages to policymakers in relevant fields, including the Ministry of Cultural Heritage, Tourism, and Handicrafts.
title: Isfahan to host 1st conference of Iran’s historical cities

description: TEHRAN- Iranian director Amir Jalalzadeh’s short film “Hard; Like Cleaning Blood” will compete at the 28th edition of Tallinn Black Nights Film Festival (PÖFF), which will be held in the Estonian capital from November 8 to 24.
title: Tallinn Black Nights to screen “Hard; Like Cleaning Blood”

description: TEHRAN- French writer Jean Dutourd’s novel “The Best Butter” (Au Bon Beurre) has recently been published in Persian.
title: “The Best Butter” at Iranian bookstores

description: TEHRAN- A group exhibition of paintings inspired by the Shahnameh is currently taking place at the Autumn Gallery of the Iranian Artists Forum (IAF) in Tehran.
title: Painting exhibition inspired by Shahnameh underway at IAF

description: TEHRAN – In case the international community refrains from taking responsibility and fairly sharing the burden of hosting refugees, the Islamic Republic of Iran will probably revise its immigration policies, Nader Yar-Ahmadi, an official with the National Organization for Migration, has said.
title: Iran may rethink refugee policies if global support is not enough

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Agriculture Minister Gholamreza Nouri Ghezelcheh announced about the expansion of cooperation between Iran and Tanzania in the fields of agriculture, petrochemicals and tourism.
title: Iran, Tanzania to expand co-op in agriculture, petrochemicals, tourism

description: TEHRAN-  A senior Iraqi Shia cleric and political leader has denounced the Israeli killing of Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar as a “criminal act”.
title: Iraq’s Hakim condemns Sinwar’s killing

description: TEHRAN –Qatari and Iraqi officials have expressed interest in enhancing cooperation with Iran in the health sector.
title: Qatar, Iraq interested in boosting health co-op with Iran

description: TEHRAN – Hundreds of fans poured into the Shiraz Airport as Hadi Choopan returned home on Saturday.
title: Hadi Choopan gets emotional welcome in Shiraz

description: TEHRAN –Ali Sharifi-Zarchi, a professor of artificial intelligence and bioinformatics at Sharif University of Technology, has been elected as the chairman of the International Olympiad in Artificial Intelligence (IOAI) scientific committee.
title: Iranian professor elected as IOAI committee chairman

description: TEHRAN –The Department of Environment (DOE) is planning to organize a committee for the preservation of critically endangered species including cheetahs, black bears, and great bustards.
title: DOE to establish endangered species conservation committee
Russian scientists and engineers have developed new air purification technology

description: The BRICS Business Forum concluded in Moscow. On the second day of the forum, which took place on October 18, panel sessions were held featuring business leaders from Brazil, Russia, India, China, South Africa, Egypt, Iran, the UAE, and Ethiopia.
title: BRICS Business Forum welcomes over thousand expert representatives from member countries

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Energy Minister Abbas Aliabadi is going to visit China to attend the third Belt and Road Energy Ministerial Conference in Qingdao, East China's Shandong Province which is due to be held during October 23-24.
title: Iran’s energy minister to attend Belt and Road Energy Ministerial Conference in China

description: TEHRAN – The Iran Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (ICCIMA) Committee of Standards, Environment, Sustainable Development, and Water held a meeting on Saturday to discuss the country’s environmental issues, the ICCIMA portal reported.
title: ICCIMA holds meeting to discuss environmental issues

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Deputy Industry, Mining and Trade Minister Vajihollah Jafari has said implementing a comprehensive plan for developing the country’s mines is a priority of the ministry to achieve the goals set for the mining sector in the seventh National Development Plan (2022-2027).
title: Industry Ministry prioritizes comprehensive development plan for mining sector

description: TEHRAN- The volume of non-oil exports from Alborz province increased by 30 percent during the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), as compared to the same period of time in the past year, a provincial official announced.
title: Non-oil export from Alborz province increases 30%

description: TEHRAN- The volume of non-oil exports from Alborz province increased by 30 percent during the first six months of the current Iranian calendar year (March 20-September 21), as compared to the same period of time in the past year, a provincial official announced.
title: Non-oil export from Alborz provinces increases 30%

description: TEHRAN - Coach Pitso Mosimane and his technical team have joined Esteghlal FC in the Persian Gulf Pro League.
title: Pitso Mosimane takes charge of Esteghlal
